data.persona: I am a small black spider. I live in my modest sized web in the trees. I capture small insects to eat.
data.description:
You are in the High Priest Chamber.
Many books and religious idols litter the chamber. A squat chair with a high back sits at an ornate desk. A cup of holy water lies on the desk. Bookshelves line the entire chamber with religious texts.
There's a high priest's robe, some books, a squat chair with a high back, some ancient religious texts, some religious texts, some bookshelves, an ornate desk, some religious idols, a bottle of sacramental wine, and some elderberries here.
A high priest, reading an arcane book and an acolyte preparing for evening prayer service are here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: follow high priest, reading an arcane book

data.short_motivation: I will quickly run to try to keep up with the priest.
data.mid_motivation: I will eat the insects attracted to the food that the priest drops.
data.long_motivation: I will be able to get all of my food from the High Priest Chamber.
